title: Simply Beautiful Hair Chalks - 24 Non Toxic Temporary Hair Dye Colour Soft Pastels
description: Hair chalking is the newest craze in temporary hair color. Add a flair of color without the long-term commitment of dying. Hair Color Chalk is temporary hair color that rubs directly onto your hair, then washes out!

title: Simply Beautiful Miracle Marvel 10 Effects - 10 In 1 Keratin Based Miracle Leave-In Hair Treatment - 250ml
description:
A unique 10 in 1 leave in spray treatment, formulated to give 10 fantastic benefits to enhance the hair. Leaves the hair feeling softer, silkier and more manageable.

The benefits:

1 Replenishes lost moisture in dry, damaged hair.

2 Prevents static

3 Protection from heated styling tools

4 Effective detangler

5 Rich in antioxidants

6 Aids in brushing to help reduce breakages

7 Maintains hair styles for longer

8 Reduces the appearance of split ends

9 Controls frizzy, unruly hair and adds shine

10 Creates body & movement

Directions of use: Spray evenly over damp hair.  Do not rinse. Leave in and style as normal.

title: Moroccan Argan Hair Oil Conditioning Treatment With Natural Pure Ingredients From Morocco 100ml
description: It's time to take things back to basics and if making your hair beautiful is on your agenda then this Luxury Argan Hair Treatment Oil from Morocco is just the right product for you! The luxurious fusion of Argan Oil and Vitamin E creates a powerful antioxidant that provides intense hydration to dry and damaged hair. Not only was it shipped all the way from Morocco on a caravan of camels especially for you but it's specifically formulated to help reduce frizz and drying time. This unique treatment instantly smoothes texture and adds shine for a glossy, radiant finish. Directions Of Use: - For short hair apply 2 to 3 pumps in to the hand and distribute evenly through damp hair. - For Long hair use 4 to 5 pumps. Caution: External use only. Avoid contact with eyes.
